name: booktools
description: 跨平台的epub电子书处理工具集 - 转换epub为markdown并整理文件结构

scripts.postinstall: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('npm install -g epub2md', {stdio:'inherit'}); console.log('✅ epub2md installed globally'); } catch(e) { console.log('⚠️  Please install epub2md manually: npm install -g epub2md'); }"

author: BookTools Team
